title: Instructional Design for Implementing Flipped Learning in [K-12] Multi-Age Classrooms

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Focuses on implementing flipped learning for science subjects in environments with mixed-age and mixed-grade learners. Emphasizes personalized learning support through a formative assessment-centered feedback system

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design process of flipped learning activities tailored to multi-age classroom characteristics
Learners can develop and apply pre-learning materials using digital content in science subjects
Learners can implement three or more classroom activity strategies to promote interaction in mixed-age groups
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
